title: Ayurvedic Immunity Sets
cleaned_text: Learn more about the [effects of Amalaki](https://www.everest-ayurveda.com/amla-heavenly-fruit-india-3739) or its multifarious [use options](https://www.everest-ayurveda.com/amla-user-guide-3745). Immunity Sets are designed to strengthen the immune system at a deeper level where the true resistance of the body is formed. According to Ayurveda, the body's resistance is an energetic shield, that is created by a gradual process of metabolism. This happens when the necessary substances from our daily diet, nourish the bodily tissues that make up our physical body. At the very end of the nourishment process, a subtle energetic substance, called ojas, is formed which is responsible for the complete vitality, strength, endurance, energy and immunity of the body. It provides active protection against viruses, bacteria and infections and represents the deepest principle of immunity of all human bodily tissues in the form of mental and physical health.
